00021 #include "affinity.h"

00023 
00024 affinity::affinity(void)
00025 {
00026   initialize();
00027 }
00028 
00029 affinity::affinity(float u1, float v1, float up1, float vp1,
00030                    float u2, float v2, float up2, float vp2,
00031                    float u3, float v3, float up3, float vp3)
00032 {
00033   initialize();
00034 
00035   estimate(u1, v1, up1, vp1,
00036            u2, v2, up2, vp2,
00037            u3, v3, up3, vp3);
00038 }
00039 
00040 void affinity::initialize(void)
00041 {
00042   AA = cvCreateMat(6, 6, CV_32FC1);
00043   X  = cvCreateMat(6, 1, CV_32FC1);
00044   B  = cvCreateMat(6, 1, CV_32FC1);
00045   type = CV_32FC1;
00046 
00047   type = CV_MAT_MAGIC_VAL | CV_MAT_CONT_FLAG | CV_MAT_TYPE(type);
00048   cols = 3;
00049   rows = 3;
00050   step = cols * CV_ELEM_SIZE(type);
00051   data.ptr = (uchar*)new float[cols * rows];
00052   refcount = NULL;
00053 
00054   cvmSet(2, 0, 0.);
00055   cvmSet(2, 1, 0.);
00056   cvmSet(2, 2, 1.);
00057 }
00058 
00059 affinity::~affinity()
00060 {
00061         cvReleaseMat(&AA);
00062         cvReleaseMat(&X);
00063         cvReleaseMat(&B);
00064         delete [] data.ptr;
00065 }
00066 
00067 ostream& operator<< (ostream& o, const affinity& A)
00068 {
00069   o << cvmGet(&A, 0, 0) << "\t" << cvmGet(&A, 0, 1) << "\t" << cvmGet(&A, 0, 2) << endl;
00070   o << cvmGet(&A, 1, 0) << "\t" << cvmGet(&A, 1, 1) << "\t" << cvmGet(&A, 1, 2) << endl;
00071 
00072   return o;
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool affinity::estimate(float u1, float v1, float up1, float vp1,
00076                         float u2, float v2, float up2, float vp2,
00077                         float u3, float v3, float up3, float vp3)
00078 {
00079   ::cvmSet(AA, 0, 0, u1); ::cvmSet(AA, 0, 1, v1); ::cvmSet(AA, 0, 2, 1.); ::cvmSet(AA, 0, 3, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 0, 4, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 0, 5, 0.);
00080   ::cvmSet(AA, 1, 0, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 1, 1, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 1, 2, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 1, 3, u1); ::cvmSet(AA, 1, 4, v1); ::cvmSet(AA, 1, 5, 1.);
00081 
00082   ::cvmSet(AA, 2, 0, u2); ::cvmSet(AA, 2, 1, v2); ::cvmSet(AA, 2, 2, 1.); ::cvmSet(AA, 2, 3, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 2, 4, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 2, 5, 0.);
00083   ::cvmSet(AA, 3, 0, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 3, 1, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 3, 2, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 3, 3, u2); ::cvmSet(AA, 3, 4, v2); ::cvmSet(AA, 3, 5, 1.);
00084 
00085   ::cvmSet(AA, 4, 0, u3); ::cvmSet(AA, 4, 1, v3); ::cvmSet(AA, 4, 2, 1.); ::cvmSet(AA, 4, 3, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 4, 4, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 4, 5, 0.);
00086   ::cvmSet(AA, 5, 0, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 5, 1, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 5, 2, 0.); ::cvmSet(AA, 5, 3, u3); ::cvmSet(AA, 5, 4, v3); ::cvmSet(AA, 5, 5, 1.);
00087 
00088   ::cvmSet(B, 0, 0, up1);
00089   ::cvmSet(B, 1, 0, vp1);
00090 
00091   ::cvmSet(B, 2, 0, up2);
00092   ::cvmSet(B, 3, 0, vp2);
00093 
00094   ::cvmSet(B, 4, 0, up3);
00095   ::cvmSet(B, 5, 0, vp3);
00096 
00097   int ok = cvSolve(AA, B, X, CV_SVD);
00098 
00099   if (ok != 1)
00100   {
00101     cerr << "affinity::estimate: cvSolve failure" << endl;
00102     return false;
00103   }
00104 
00105   cvmSet(0, 0, ::cvmGet(X, 0, 0));
00106   cvmSet(0, 1, ::cvmGet(X, 1, 0));
00107   cvmSet(0, 2, ::cvmGet(X, 2, 0));
00108 
00109   cvmSet(1, 0, ::cvmGet(X, 3, 0));
00110   cvmSet(1, 1, ::cvmGet(X, 4, 0));
00111   cvmSet(1, 2, ::cvmGet(X, 5, 0));
00112 
00113   return true;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void affinity::transform_point(float u, float v, float * up, float * vp)
00117 {
00118   *up = float(cvmGet(0, 0) * u + cvmGet(0, 1) * v + cvmGet(0, 2));
00119   *vp = float(cvmGet(1, 0) * u + cvmGet(1, 1) * v + cvmGet(1, 2));
00120 }
00121 
00122 void affinity::transform_point(double u, double v, double * up, double * vp)
00123 {
00124   *up = cvmGet(0, 0) * u + cvmGet(0, 1) * v + cvmGet(0, 2);
00125   *vp = cvmGet(1, 0) * u + cvmGet(1, 1) * v + cvmGet(1, 2);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void affinity::compute_cvGetQuandrangleSubPix_transform(CvMat * A_q, int w, int h)
00129 {
00130   float det = float(cvmGet(0, 0) * cvmGet(1, 1) - cvmGet(1, 0) * cvmGet(0, 1));
00131 
00132   ::cvmSet(A_q, 0, 0,  cvmGet(1, 1) / det);
00133   ::cvmSet(A_q, 0, 1, -cvmGet(0, 1) / det);
00134   ::cvmSet(A_q, 1, 0, -cvmGet(1, 0) / det);
00135   ::cvmSet(A_q, 1, 1,  cvmGet(0, 0) / det);
00136 
00137   ::cvmSet(A_q, 0, 2, ::cvmGet(A_q, 0, 0) * (w / 2 - cvmGet(0, 2)) + ::cvmGet(A_q, 0, 1) * (h / 2 - cvmGet(1, 2)));
00138   ::cvmSet(A_q, 1, 2, ::cvmGet(A_q, 1, 0) * (w / 2 - cvmGet(0, 2)) + ::cvmGet(A_q, 1, 1) * (h / 2 - cvmGet(1, 2)));
00139 }
00140 
00141 void mcvGetQuadrangleSubPix(IplImage * src, IplImage * dest, affinity * A, 
00142                             int /*fill_outliers*/, CvScalar /*fill_value*/)
00143 {
00144   A->rows = 2;
00145   cvGetQuadrangleSubPix(src, dest, A);
00146   A->rows = 3;
00147 }
